metadata.title: CVE-2015-3854 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: packages/SystemUI/src/com/android/systemui/power/PowerNotificationWarnings.javain Android 5.x allows attackers to bypass a DEVICE_POWER permissionrequirement via a broadcast intent with the PNW.stopSaver action, akainternal bug 20918350.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
